about_the_game:
Awaken, brave knight, in the depths of a mysterious cave. With no memory of how you arrived, you must explore, battle, and unlock powerful abilities to survive and escape this treacherous dungeon. As you progress, you'll navigate a sprawling, interconnected world in classic Metroidvania style, uncovering secrets and acquiring new skills that open up previously inaccessible areas.

Engage in intense 2D platforming action, mastering precise movements and timing to overcome deadly traps and formidable foes. Unlock powerful abilities like dashing and double-jumping to enhance your mobility and combat prowess.

As an indie game, this adventure offers a unique and personal touch, crafted with passion and attention to detail. Embark on a perilous quest filled with danger, mystery, and adventure. Will you uncover the secrets of your past and escape the dungeon's clutches, or will you fall victim to the horrors within?
